details.songOfAdoration: What a Friend We Have in Jesus #182

list: January 4: Tonight we will read through 1 & 2 Thessalonians.

January 12: The Women on Mission will meet at 6:00 PM in the Lewis Fellowship Hall. Anna Collins will present the program & Linda Baker will provide the food. All women are invited and encouraged to attend.
